transport.question: I have wheels and go 'beep beep!' What am I?

hints.text: 🚦 I stop at red lights.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 I can carry people.
🚗 I am a common vehicle.

transport.question: I float on water and can carry lots of people and cargo. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I need a large body of water to move.
⚓ I sometimes have an anchor.
🚢 I am bigger than a canoe.

transport.question: I travel on tracks and can be very long, carrying many passengers. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I need a special road to travel.
🚂 I might make a 'choo choo' sound.
💺 I have lots of seats.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and can take you to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am usually high above the clouds.
✈️ I have wings.
🛬 You go to an airport to ride me.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you use your feet to move me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧑‍🦽 You need to balance to ride me.
🔔 I might have a bell.
🚲 I am smaller than a car.

transport.question: I take people to school or around the city. What am I?

hints.text: 📍 I have specific stops.
🎫 You sometimes need a ticket to ride me.
🚌 I am a very big vehicle.

transport.question: I carry things, I’m bigger than a car, and I often carry things for supermarkets. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I am used for delivering large items.
🚧 I am longer than most vehicles.
🚚 I sometimes have a trailer in the back.

transport.question: I fly really high and can go to the moon! What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am the fastest form of transport.
✨ I explore outer space.
👨‍🚀 Astronauts use me.

transport.question: I help farmers work in the fields. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I am often seen in the countryside.
🚜 I help with planting and harvesting.
🌱 I am a strong vehicle with big tires.

transport.question: I carry passengers underground in a city. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 I travel in tunnels.
🏙️ You can find me in big cities.
🚈 I am a type of train that goes under the ground.

ocean.question: I wiggle and swim, and many fish call me home. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I grow on the ocean floor
🌊 I move with the water
🐠 Fish like to hide in me

ocean.question: I am a home for a crab and sometimes a snail.  I am hard and found on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I used to belong to a creature.
🐌 Some animals live inside me, others used to.
🏖️ You can find me on the sandy shore.

ocean.question: I am a very big fish with lots of sharp teeth!  I love to eat fish and play in the ocean.

hints.text: 🦈 Some people are very afraid of me.
🦷 I have many rows of pointy teeth.
📺 You might have seen me in a scary movie.

ocean.question: I'm a mammal that swims in the sea, known for clicking and talking to my family. What am I?

hints.text: 🐬 I am very smart!
🗣️ I use sounds to communicate.
🌊 I like to jump out of the water.

ocean.question: I'm very big, I'm blue, and I sing a low song as I swim. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am the largest animal on Earth.
🎶 I make a very deep sound.
🚢 Ships look very small next to me.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea, I can change colors, can you guess who I am?

hints.text: 🐙 People find me very interesting to look at.
🎨 I can camouflage myself.
🖐️ I have more than two arms.

ocean.question: I'm a very slow sea creature with a hard shell on my back. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I lay my eggs on the beach.
🥬 I like to eat seagrass.
👵 I can live to be very old.

ocean.question: I have a stinger and drift in the sea, touching me can cause pain, what could I be?

hints.text: 🍥 I look like jelly.
😖 I can give you a nasty sting.
💨 I float around in the water.

ocean.question: I am small and colorful, living in a coral reef. I like to hide in the anemone. What am I?

hints.text: 🤡 I have orange and white stripes.
🏠 I live with a stinging plant.
🐠 Nemo is one of us.

ocean.question: I am a very old boat, that sank to the bottom of the ocean, what am I now?

hints.text: ⚓ I used to float.
🐟 Now I am home to many fish and sea creatures.
❌ Nobody is sailing me anymore.
